its ok , kinda toxic kinda wholesome.
If you can get your trust factor out of the shitter, it is actually a very enjoyable game.

Solid game, lots of guns and violence but otherwise enjoyable. I dislike the part where blood is visible and people are killed. It's brutal and sends the wrong message in terms of how people should solve problems. I think the terrorists and CT should work out their differences.

Otherwise, gameplay is good, graphics are stale but competitive, and it's very fun to f*ck over my team.
